messages: Need some food, anyone got extra bread? 🍞
Watch out for creepers around here! 💥
Mining for iron, hope I find some soon! ⛏️
Anyone know how to tame a wolf? 🐺
I’m thinking of exploring the Nether next. 🔥
Does anyone want to trade resources? 🤝
Be careful, zombies are everywhere tonight. ☠️
I’m setting up a farm near spawn. 🌱
Why does the chicken cross the road? 😂
I swear I heard a ghast nearby... 😱
Anyone up for a building contest? 🏗️
Let’s meet at the village square in 10 minutes.
